translations: 畸齿矫正的，齿列矫正的

sentences.translation: 第6部分：风险的矫正治疗。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the health of children with orthodontic treatment.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨儿童正畸患者的口腔保健情况。

sentences.sentence: To evaluate the time effect on mechanical properties of orthodontic arch wires.
sentences.translation: 目的评价临床使用时间的长短对弓丝机械性能的影响。
